description: This file contains unit tests for the UserService class, testing user retrieval functionalities using Mockito and JUnit 5.

classes.name: UserServiceTest
classes.description: Test class for UserService, containing unit tests for user retrieval methods.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes mock dependencies and the service instance before each test.

methods.name: readUser_found
methods.description: Tests successfully reading a user by identification number.

methods.name: readUser_notFound
methods.description: Tests the exception thrown when a user is not found by identification number.

methods.name: readUsers_success
methods.description: Tests retrieving a list of users with a successful Page response.
